name: Play AI
description: $PLAI , the native token of Play AI Network. It serves as the primary economic incentive for the Orchestration Layer, acting as the medium of payment, facilitating governance and enabling value accrual within the Play AI Stack. It is the central component that powers all interactions and transactions that happen within the ecosystem. And soon $PLAI will be the backbone powering all automation across the internet, and in physical devices as it evolves into its final form.
